div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1151 Cherniakovo (formerly Sultanovka), Lenino (formerly Sem' Kolodezey) raion, Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1852 Burial: 47-44 B.C. Contents: 100+ AE Asander: AE (as BMC 1?) Disposition: Leningrad 15 (merged with main collection) Liutsenko, p. 16
